channel.title: Data.table on The Amateur Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Data.table on The Amateur Data Scientist

item.title: Wrangling and Manipulation of Monthly Philippine Consumer Price Index
item.description: 1 More Paths, More Knowledge 2 Extension of data.frame 3 Where | Order By, Select | Update, Group By 4 Monthly Philippine Consumer Price Index 1994 Jan to 2018 Jun 4.1 Finagler 4.2 ISO 8601 Date 4.3 Item Category Levels 4.4 Geographic Levels 5 The Power of Packages 6 Code 7 References 1 More Paths, More Knowledge In a series of posts, I discussed how I turned a messy data, the monthly Philippine consumer price index to tidy data, using packages and functions in the tidyverse.

item.title: Wrangling and Manipulation of Monthly Philippine Consumer Price Index
